product.title: Dumbo on Land on Sea in the Air | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
Dumbo on Land on Sea in the Air

In this delightful reprise featuring Disney’s most beloved pachyderm, Dumbo and the other circus animals encounter a streak of bad luck when their train breaks down on the way to their opening performance. Not to be discouraged, the innovative group utilizes creativity and ingenuity to locate other means of transportation.

Tie-in Activity: Engage your child in a discussion of the different modes of transportation. Ask her to list or find toy versions of land, sea, and air vehicles.
